title: So Many Democrats Sending Their Kids to Ukraine | Guests: John Solomon, Peter Schweizer, & Rudy Atallah | 10/10/19
description:
Why do the children of top Democrats keep showing up in Ukraine? The country has the GDP of Mississippi and the corruption of Colombia, but now Nancy Pelosi’s son is involved too! And not only did Joe Biden call for impeachment, but his campaign BLASTED the New York Times for dealing with “conspiracy theorists” John Solomon and Peter Schweizer. Glenn has both CREDIBLE men on to discuss how the facts are actually well documented. And the story goes WAY deeper than Joe and Hunter Biden – all the way up to Obama. The Nazarene Fund’s Rudy Atallah joins the program with an update on Turkey’s attacks in Syria and what the organization is doing to aid and remove Christians from danger – but they need YOUR support!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
